```{r}
t <- seq(0, 2*pi, length.out = 100)
x <- 16 * sin(t)^3
y <- 13 * cos(t) - 5 * cos(2*t) - 2 * cos(3*t) - cos(4*t)

# Plot the heart shape
plot(x, y, type = "n", asp = 1, xlab = "", ylab = "", main = "R Heart Shape") # Set up plot area
polygon(x, y, col = "red", border = "red") # Draw and fill the polygon
```
